data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Christiaan Huijgens cruise from Rotterdam to Batavia started at 1842-06-30
Ship: Christiaan Huijgens, Voyage: Rotterdam - Batavia, 1st Observer: F.B. Teuneszen (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
